heading: Today
text: Showers this morning spreading east from Lake George, Rt. 4, and the White Mountains north, tapering off this afternoon.  Any morning sun south giving way to clouds.  Scattered afternoon showers or a thunderstorm.  Highs in the upper 60s to low 70s north, 70s south.  Winds light east, and south near 10 mph from the Green Mountains west, becoming light in the afternoon.

heading: Tonight
text: A few spotty showers, except a good chance near and south of the MA border.  Lows in the 50s.  Winds light and variable.

heading: Wednesday
text: Mostly cloudy.  A chance of a few localized, passing showers, especially in the afternoon. A glimpse of sun far north.  Highs in the upper 60s to low 70s.  Light winds, becoming north to northeast up to 10 mph.
